name: Tele-Strem FileStream (4GB Support)
description: Advanced Telegram-based Stremio addon with FileStream technology supporting up to 4GB files for Premium users

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID where files are stored (e.g., -1001234567890). Create a channel, post something, forward to @missrose_bot, reply with /id

TELEGRAM_API_ID.description: API ID from https://my.telegram.org (REQUIRED for 4GB files support)

TELEGRAM_API_HASH.description: API Hash from https://my.telegram.org (REQUIRED for 4GB files support)

TELEGRAM_STRING_SESSION.description: Session string (add this AFTER first deployment and authentication)

MULTI_TOKEN1.description: Worker bot token #1 for load balancing (optional but recommended)

MULTI_TOKEN2.description: Worker bot token #2 for load balancing (optional but recommended)

MULTI_TOKEN3.description: Worker bot token #3 for load balancing (optional but recommended)

MULTI_TOKEN4.description: Worker bot token #4 for load balancing (optional)

MULTI_TOKEN5.description: Worker bot token #5 for load balancing (optional)

SEARCH_CHANNELS.description: Comma-separated list of channels to search for content (e.g., @movies,@series,-1001111111111)

HASH_LENGTH.description: Length of hash for streaming URLs (6-32 characters)

ENABLE_AUTO_FORWARD.description: Automatically forward files to log channel (true/false)

HOST.description: Your app's full URL (leave empty for auto-detection)
